title.value: Иммуностимулирующее действие препарата 'Бацинил' на организм телят в раннем онтогенезе
Immunestimulating action of preparation 'Batsinil' on calves in early ontogenesis
Immunestimulating action of preparation 'Batsinil' on calves in early ontogenesis

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Balueva, N.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of the study of the biologic immunostimulating preparation 'Batsinil' (liquid cell-free preparation on basis of spore-forming bacterium metabolism products – bacillus Bacillis subtilis) on the body of calves in early postnatal period. It was found that supplementation of dairy food preparation 'Batsinil' to calves during the prophylactic period helps to raise defenses (highest level of immunological reactance will achieved in a doze of 10 ml/goals in a day) by increasing the morphological and biochemical parameters and humoral defense factors. The contents of erythrocytes and hemoglobin increases on 4,2 and 4,3% (Р 0,05), bactericidal activity of blood whey on 1,96% (Р 0,01), lysozyme - on 0,79% (Р 0,01), betalyzine - 0,87 %; IgG+A and M - on 4,8 and 8,8% (Р 0,05).
